name: iFrame Images Gallery
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
iframe images gallery is a simple wordpress plugin to create horizontal image slideshow. Horizontal bar will be display below the images to scroll.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/07/24/wordpress-plugin-wp-iframe-images-gallery/

  • Live Demo
  • More info
  • Comments/Suggestion
  • About author

iframe images gallery is a simple wordpress plugin to create horizontal image slideshow. Horizontal bar will be display below the images to scroll. With the help of the horizontal bar user can scroll to see the entire image. Please check the below demo.

Features of this plugin

  • Simple image gallery.
  • No javascript.
  • Manual scroll to see all the images.

Click here to see detailed information about this plugin.
sections.installation: See Installation Instruction and Configuration information and Demo
sections.faq:
Q1. How to add this plugin in the widget sidebar?

Q2. How to arrange the width and height of the gallery?

Answer page
sections.changelog:
1.0

First version.

3.0

Tested UoTo 3.3

4.0

Tested UoTo 3.4

5.0

Fixed plug-in directory violations issue

6.0

New demo link, http://www.gopiplus.com

6.1

Tested up to 3.5
Option to add the gallery directly in the theme file.

7.0

Tested up to 3.6
New admin interface.
Added few security features.

7.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (iframe-images.po) available in the languages folder. Translators Welcome.
  3. Supports network multisite website (Manual table creation required).

7.2

  1. Tested up to 3.9

7.3

  1. Tested up to 4.0

7.4

  1. Tested up to 4.1

7.5

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

7.6

  1. Tested up to 4.3
  2. Image upload option is added in the plugin admin. With this option you can easily upload (or select from media) your images into this plugin.

7.7

  1. Tested up to 4.4
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

7.8

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

7.9

  1. Tested up to 4.6

8.0

  1. Fixed design issue for wordpress theme twenty sixteen

8.1

  1. Tested up to 4.7

8.2

  1. Tested up to 4.8

8.3

  1. Tested up to 4.9

8.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.
  3. Converted admin JS alert message into WP class file.

8.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

8.6

  1. Tested up to 5.4

8.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

8.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

8.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

9.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9
